metadata.Title: CVE-2020-22278 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** DISPUTED ** phpMyAdmin through 5.0.2 allows CSV injection via Export Section. NOTE: the vendor disputes this because "the CSV file is accurately generated based on the database contents."

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
